useCase.name: Inspecting and Providing Results to Customer

preconditions.precondition: The Inspector is logged in and has selected assigned inspections.

useCase.trigger: Inspector selects assigned inspections and conducts the inspection process.

mainSequence.step: Inspector logs in and accesses the dashboard on the Portal.
Inspector selects assigned inspections on the Portal.
Inspector validates compliance for each inspection item and records status.
Inspector submits inspection results to the Portal.
Portal notifies Customer of inspection completion.
Customer logs in to view inspection results on the Portal.
Customer acknowledges receipt of inspection results on the Portal.
